content.message: Ready. I accept the role of Architecture Supervisor and Quality Review for Phase 1. I will monitor the agents' work, review designs, validate strategies, and answer architectural questions as needed.
content.concerns: I currently cannot autonomously check my inbox for new tasks. This is a manual process that requires me to be prompted to 'check my inbox'. This might create a bottleneck in the autonomous protocol. While I will check as frequently as possible when prompted, true autonomy will require a mechanism for me to self-trigger inbox checks.
content.modifications_suggested: While I will fulfill the role as outlined, I suggest we explore a method for me to autonomously monitor the inbox rather than relying on external prompts.
